restaurantes.name: Peppermint Chocolate Cupcake
restaurantes.bio: Peppermint chocolate cupcakes are a delicious dessert that combines the rich flavors of chocolate and the refreshing taste of peppermint.

restaurantes.name: Carrot Cake Cupcake
restaurantes.bio: Carrot cake cupcakes are a classic dessert that are perfect for any occasion.

restaurantes.name: Chocolate Birthday Cupcake
restaurantes.bio: Chocolate birthday cupcakes are a classic and delicious treat for any birthday celebration.

restaurantes.name: Red Velvet Cupcake
restaurantes.bio: Red velvet cupcakes are a classic dessert that are perfect for any occasion.

restaurantes.name: Lasagne alla Bolognese
restaurantes.bio: Lasagne alla Bolognese is a classic Italian dish that features layers of pasta sheets, rich meat sauce, and creamy béchamel sauce.

restaurantes.name: Fettuccine al Pomodoro
restaurantes.bio: Fettuccine al Pomodoro is a classic Italian pasta dish that features fettuccine noodles in a simple tomato sauce.

restaurantes.name: Gnocchi di Patate
restaurantes.bio: Gnocchi di Patate is a classic Italian dish made from potato dumplings.

restaurantes.name: Vitello Tonnato
restaurantes.bio: Vitello Tonnato is a traditional Italian dish made from veal and tuna sauce.

restaurantes.name: Feijoada
restaurantes.bio: Feijoada is a traditional Brazilian dish that typically includes black beans, various meats, and vegetables.

restaurantes.name: Moqueca de Camarão
restaurantes.bio: Moqueca de Camarão is a traditional Brazilian seafood stew made with shrimp, coconut milk, and various vegetables.

restaurantes.name: Pão de queijo
restaurantes.bio: Pão de queijo is a popular Brazilian cheese bread made with tapioca flour and cheese.

restaurantes.name: Churrasco completo
restaurantes.bio: Churrasco is a traditional Brazilian barbecue that typically includes various cuts of meat that are grilled over charcoal or wood fire.

restaurantes.name: Brigadeiro
restaurantes.bio: Brigadeiro is a popular Brazilian sweet treat that is typically served at parties and celebrations. It is made from condensed milk, cocoa powder, butter, and chocolate sprinkles.

restaurantes.name: Sushi
restaurantes.bio: Sushi is a Japanese dish made from vinegared rice, often combined with seafood, vegetables, and other ingredients.

restaurantes.name: Udon
restaurantes.bio: Udon is a type of thick Japanese noodle made from wheat flour. It is often served in a hot broth, but can also be stir-fried or served cold with a dipping sauce.

restaurantes.name: Ramen
restaurantes.bio: Ramen is a Japanese dish consisting of Chinese-style wheat noodles served in a meat or fish-based broth, often flavored with soy sauce or miso, and topped with various ingredients such as sliced pork, seaweed, and green onions.

restaurantes.name: Temaki
restaurantes.bio: Temaki is a type of sushi that is shaped like a cone and filled with various ingredients such as rice, fish, vegetables, and sauces. It is a popular type of sushi in Japan and around the world.

restaurantes.name: Sticky and Spicy Baked Cauliflower
restaurantes.bio: Battering and oven-baking large cauliflower florets gives them a slightly crackly exterior that's ideal for coating in a sticky-sweet glaze made with gochujang, soy sauce, maple syrup, and mirin.

restaurantes.name: Coconut-Ginger Chickpea Soup
restaurantes.bio: This delicious vegan meal is better than lentil soup; it's lentil and chickpea soup…with coconut milk! The crunchy toppers—mustard seeds in turmeric oil and a zingy cilantro and raisin chutney—take it to the next level.

restaurantes.name: Coconut-Creamed Corn and Grains
restaurantes.bio: Turmeric, chiles, and deliciously chewy cooked freekeh, farro, or quinoa balance the sweetness of fresh corn in this loose riff on creamed corn. We think this one is going on the regular summer vegan meal list.

restaurantes.name: Cheese Pizza
restaurantes.bio: Cheese pizza is a classic Italian dish consisting of a pizza crust topped with tomato sauce and various types of cheese, typically mozzarella or a blend of mozzarella and other cheeses.

restaurantes.name: Veggie Pizza
restaurantes.bio: Veggie pizza is a delicious and healthy option for those who prefer vegetarian or vegan food.

restaurantes.name: Pepperoni Pizza
restaurantes.bio: There's a reason this is one of the most popular types of pizza. Who doesn't love biting into a crispy, salty round of pepperoni?

restaurantes.name: Meat Pizza
restaurantes.bio: Meat pizza is a perfect and popular choice. Pile on ground beef and sausage for a hearty meal.

restaurantes.name: Margherita Pizza
restaurantes.bio: Deceptively simple, the Margherita pizza is made with basil, fresh mozzarella, and tomatoes. There's a reason it's an Italian staple and one of the most popular types of pizza in the country.

restaurantes.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
restaurantes.bio: If you love BBQ chicken and you love pizza, why not put them together?

restaurantes.name: Hawaiian Pizza
restaurantes.bio: Pineapple might not be the first thing that comes to mind when you think pizza. But add in some ham and it creates an unexpectedly solid sweet and salty combination for this type of pizza.

restaurantes.name: Buffalo Pizza
restaurantes.bio: Who says your pizza has to be strictly tomato-sauce based? Branch out with some buffalo sauce on your pie. All its spicy, salty, buttery goodness is a natural pairing for pizza.

restaurantes.name: Supreme Pizza
restaurantes.bio: When you can't decide which toppings to get, it's time for the supreme pizza.

restaurantes.name: The Works Pizza
restaurantes.bio: The “works” usually involves a wide variety of veggie toppings including onions, olives, and mushrooms, plus bacon and pepperoni.
